mapper.select: SELECT a.*, b.productCode, b.count AS pCount, c.cate1, c.cate2, c.thumb1, c.name AS pName, c.price AS pPrice, c.discount AS pDiscount, c.point AS pPoint, c.delivery AS pDelivery, FLOOR(c.price * (1 - c.discount / 100)) AS salePrice, d.name AS uName, d.hp AS uHp, d.zip AS uZip, d.addr1 AS uAddr1, d.addr2 AS uAddr2, d.point AS uPoint FROM km_product_order AS a JOIN km_product_order_detail AS b ON a.orderId = b.orderId JOIN km_product AS c ON b.productCode = c.productCode JOIN km_member AS d ON a.uid = d.uid WHERE a.orderId=#{orderId};
